about.summary: Python tools and utilities for working with the AnyBody Modelling System

name: anypytools
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.9.0" %}

package:
  name: anypytools
  version: {{ version }}

source:
   fn: {{ version }}.tar.gz
   url: https://github.com/AnyBody-Research-Group/AnyPyTools/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
   sha1: e7d02a0c0edbc2729356343526677e2b3e283381

build:          
  number: 0
  # Added to allow the pytest entry points in setup.py to work
  # This is also the reason for setuptools being a runtime dependency. 
  preserve_egg_dir: True
  skip: True  # [not win]

requirements:
  build:
    - setuptools
    - python
    - future

  run:
    - python
    - pywin32  # [py27 or py34]
    - future >=0.15
    - h5py >=2.5
    - setuptools
    - scipy >=0.15
    - notebook >=4.2
    - jupyter >=1.0

test:
    imports:
       - anypytools
       - anypytools.abcutils
       - anypytools.macro_commands


app:
    entry: jupyter notebook %PREFIX%\\share\\notebooks\\anypytools\\00_AnyPyTools_tutorial.ipynb
    summary: AnyPyTools Tutorial
    icon: apt_icon.png

about:
  home: https://github.com/AnyBody-Research-Group/AnyPyTools
  license: MIT
  summary: Python tools and utilities for working with the AnyBody Modelling System

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - melund
